document.masterDocTitle: Porcellanidae (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura) from New Caledonia and the Loyalty Islands

Remarks . The relationships between this species and two congeners,
P. militaris
and
P. heterochrous
, are discussed in the Remarks of
P. militaris
.

Distribution. Gulf of Thailand , Philippines Islands, Indonesia , New Guinea , western and eastern Australia , Nansha Islands in China ; Taiwan , Ryukyu Islands, New Caledonia , and the Loyalty Islands; shallow water to about 55 m , frequently in association with corals (
Haig 1979
;
Hsieh, et al . 1997
;
Yang & Naiyanetr 1997
; present study).
